sentences.sentence: Air raid sirens in Russian-occupied Crimea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Smoke rising over the rooftops after the headquarters of Russia's Black Sea fleet was hit with a missile in Sevastopol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Russians say one serviceman was injured and it claims to have shot down five missiles in an air raid that coincided with a cyber attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The commander of the Ukrainian Air Force, Mykola Oleshchuk, thanked his pilots.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The attack comes a day after Russian missiles and artillery pounded cities across Ukraine, killing at least five people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the central Ukrainian city of Cherkassy, rescuers worked overnight into Friday, searching for people feared trapped under the rubble and clearing debris after a Russian attack struck.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Russian Defense Ministry on Friday released footage claiming to show Grad multiple-launch rocket systems firing at Ukrainian army positions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They claim to have destroyed military targets near Krasny Lyman and to be carrying out combat missions in South Donetsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: South Donetsk. Climate change paused, cleaner oceans and air, thriving biodiversity, all ambitions

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: that could be achieved through global consensus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The UAE is hosting the next UN summit COP28 from November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: One of its directors told the Associated Press he's optimistic but acknowledges difficulties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There are a significant number of countries that are opposed to the language of phase-out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The way the COP process works, and I think maybe this is part of the frustration with the COP process, is that it works by consensus. You need only one country to say no, and you don't have an agreement. As some countries such as the UK shy away from energy transition deadlines, can a summit hosted by a major fossil fuel exporter offer credible solutions?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I hope they will be saying we didn't think that a process that we thought was blah blah could achieve an outcome of this sort, but that was the course correction that the world needed to get us to a place of comfort for all of us. Climate change protesters continue to challenge global leaders to change course.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But eight years after COP21 in Paris agreed to limit global warming to 1.5 degrees C, it would seem COP28 has its work cut out to prevent deadlines from slipping and temperatures rising.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis arrived in the French port city of Marseille on Friday for a two-day visit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He presided over a silent moment of prayer at a memorial dedicated to sailors and migrants per una visita di due giorni. Si è presieduto su un momento silenzioso di preghiera a un memoriale dedicato a salienti e migranti persi al mar, svolto da leader di fede di Marseille e organizzazioni di riscaldamento dei migranti. vedere esseri umani trattati come merce di scambio, imprigionati e torturati in modo atroce.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Non possiamo più assistere ai drammi dei naufragi dovuti a traffici odiosi e al fanatismo dell'indifferenza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: La visita è arrivata come il dilemma della migrazione in Europa è ancora in linea, billions the visit came as Europe's migration dilemma is again in the headlines after thousands of people arrived last week at the Italian island of Lampedusa around 350,000 Catholic faithful were expected in the city over the weekend including a hundred thousand to attend a parade in Marseille ahead of a Saturday mass at the Velodrome Stadium.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The players of Spain's national football team have broken their silence by saying never again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A month after winning the World Cup and one day before facing Sweden in Gothenburg, they spoke about the scandal of the forced kiss experienced by Jenny Hermoso and del impulso que han mantenido desde entonces para que las cosas cambien en el fútbol español.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sucedieron unos hechos inadmisibles bajo nuestro punto de vista con la gota que colmó el vaso con la posterior asamblea y ahí dijimos que esto no podía suceder, que no queríamos continuar por ese camino, queríamos que en esa situación que había vivido nuestra compañera y consecuencia nosotras, teníamos que decir que tolerancia cero. The squad nicknamed La Roja has barely trained since winning the World Cup and was on the verge of not playing against Sweden, but most of the players lifted their boycott on Wednesday.
